title: leave buster (i had it over a year  will it  let me go at some point? :/)
body:
i need help with leave buster it don't show me how many games i need to play to get out from it 
it can't stay forever right? if so i might stop playing league :/

replies.body: I took a look but I wasn't able to see a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  It may have been a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) which will give a lower priority queue, but only for one game.  Is everything okay now?
